CustomField.formula: 'Loaner Line Name '+ Name +' / Product Name '+Product__r.Name+' / Marketing P/N '+ Marketing_P_N__c +' / Shipped Date '+ TEXT( MONTH(Shipped_Date__c ))+"/" +TEXT(DAY(Shipped_Date__c ))+"/" +TEXT(YEAR(Shipped_Date__c ) )+ ' /Effective Return Due Date ' +TEXT( MONTH( Effective_Return_Due_Date__c ))+"/" +TEXT(DAY(Effective_Return_Due_Date__c))+"/" +TEXT(YEAR(Effective_Return_Due_Date__c) )
CustomField.label: Display Product Code Marketing
